content: Phase 1: Create comprehensive Trading Farm Brain database schema in Supabase
Phase 1: Implement TradingFarmBrainService with core archival functions
Phase 1: Set up data ingestion pipelines from existing systems
Phase 1: Create basic analytics queries and API endpoints
Phase 2: Implement calendar page with performance visualization
Phase 2: Create daily performance drill-down modals
Phase 2: Add agent and strategy performance breakdowns
Phase 3: Implement PersistenceManager for frontend state
Phase 3: Add agent memory persistence for Railway deployment
Phase 3: Create configuration persistence for dashboard components
Phase 4: Create knowledge graph relationships and search features
